summary: This mod locks 87 Boss-chests in different dungeons around Skyrim. The key is hidden somewhere close by :)
descriptionHtml:
Update 1.01 - added extra key for some chests where existing key's are too difficult to find.

With this mod you will have to find the key to most of the boss-chests in Skyrim.
My goal with the mod is to make dungeons a little more exciting and explorable.

warlock chests: 19
hagraven chests: 6
forsworn chests: 4
vampire chests: 9
dwarwen chests: 14
giant chests: 1
Draugr chests: 34

Information:

-All keys are named "Chest key"
-Most keys are relative easy to find(if you look hard enough), some are more difficult
-The keys are always in the same area as the chest (not always in the same room)
-Some dungeons have several keys fitting the same chest
-Some dungeons have several chest's with separate keys

OBS! Please do not discuss the location of the keys in the comments\forum, but feel free to PM me if you have suggestions or bug report.
author: Slarur Torarson
